name: adamnbowen/rails-base Docker container
dockerfile:
FROM adamnbowen/ruby-base:latest
MAINTAINER Adam Bowen <adamnbowen@gmail.com>

# JavaScript runtime (for Sprockets):
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y \
    nodejs \
    --no-install-recommends && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Rails dependenciesâ€”Probably don't actually need mysql-client or sqlite3:
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y \
    mysql-client \
    postgresql-client \
    sqlite3 \
    --no-install-recommends && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Install imagemagick and Postgres client dependencies:
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y \
    libpq-dev \
    imagemagick \
    --no-install-recommends && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Install Postgres 9.4 client:
RUN touch /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list && \
    echo 'deb http://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt/ trusty-pgdg main' \
    >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list && \
    curl https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc | apt-key add - && \
    apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y \
    postgresql-client-9.4 \
    --no-install-recommends && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# phantomjs dependencies
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y \
    fontconfig \
    wget \
    --no-install-recommends && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

ENV PHANTOM_JS_VERSION 2.1.1

# Install PhantomJS
RUN wget -O /tmp/phantomjs.tar.bz2 https://bitbucket.org/ariya/phantomjs/downloads/phantomjs-$PHANTOM_JS_VERSION-linux-x86_64.tar.bz2
RUN tar -xjf /tmp/phantomjs.tar.bz2 -C /tmp \
    && mv /tmp/phantomjs-$PHANTOM_JS_VERSION-linux-x86_64/bin/phantomjs /usr/local/bin/phantomjs \
    && rm /tmp/phantomjs.tar.bz2 \
    && rm -r /tmp/phantomjs-$PHANTOM_JS_VERSION-linux-x86_64

# Setup timezone
RUN echo "America/Chicago" > /etc/timezone
RUN dpkg-reconfigure -f noninteractive tzdata

run: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y     nodejs     --no-install-recommends &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y     mysql-client     postgresql-client     sqlite3     --no-install-recommends &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y     libpq-dev     imagemagick     --no-install-recommends &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

touch /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list &&     echo 'deb http://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt/ trusty-pgdg main'     >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list &&     curl https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc | apt-key add - &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y     postgresql-client-9.4     --no-install-recommends &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y     fontconfig     wget     --no-install-recommends &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
